You'll need to provide 1 of the following:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eRegistered companies\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper with your company number OR a copy of your company's Certificate of Incorporation (issued by Companies House or the equivalent within an European Economic Area state)","\u003cstrong\u003ePublic organisations\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper including organisation name (further verification may be required)","\u003cstrong\u003eCharities\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper including organisation name and registered charity number"]}
You also need to create a London Road User Charging account before setting up Fleet Auto Pay.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Add up to 5 additional authorised users","Each user gets a unique login","Optional services include mobile phone text alerts to help you manage your account"]}
Once you sign in to your new London Road User Charging account, you will be directed to complete your Fleet Auto Pay application.
Setting up Fleet Auto Pay can take up to 10 working days to complete.
Until we have confirmed that you can add vehicles to activate your service, you will need to pay the Congestion Charge another way if your vehicles are driven within the zone.
